item.title: Talking Points in East Renfrewshire
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan GT - Gerry Tougher MM So, on this next episode for Iriss.fm I went along to East Renfrewshire to hear about a new piece of work called Talking Points and I spoke to Gerry Tougher. Now, Gerry Tougher is a public Engagement Officer of East Renfrewshire. So, can you tell us what is Talking Points? GT Talking Points really is a new approach that we're taking in East Renfrewshire, essentially Talking Points are places in your community where you can the advice and support you need to help you to do the things you want.
